name: inert
content:
inert adjective
(NOT MOVING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not moving or not able to move: The inert figure of a man could be seen lying in the front of the car.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
not movingstillCan't you just sit still for a moment?motionlessHe stood motionless when he saw the snake.not move a muscleHe sat there the whole time and didn't move a muscle.stock-stillShe stood stock-still as soon as she saw the bear.immobileShe sat immobile, wondering what to do next.
See more results »
not energetic or interesting: The narrative is inert and sloppy, as if the author had been writing half-asleep.

chemistry
